title: An Act modernizing the governance of Port Authority parks in East Boston

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Madaro of Boston, a petition (subject to Joint Rules 12 and 9) of Adrian C. Madaro relative to modernizing the governance of port authority parks in the East Boston section of the city of Boston.  Environment and Natural Resources.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
